review_data.title: Nice little place, just right
review_data.content: Nice little place, just right for a weekday dinner. The menu is small, so choices are easy and the food is really good

review_data.title: Tasty Korean fast food
review_data.content: Great spot for a quick lunch of Korean specialties such as bibimbap and bulgogi. The food is prepared really fast and tastes delicious. Their homemade teas are also worth a try, especially the ginger one. Decent value for money in a very expensive city.

review_data.title: Originell und lecker
review_data.content: Sehr leckeres koreanisches Essen zu fairen Preisen! Modern und gemütlich eingerichtet, freundliches und zuvorkommendes Personal. Wir kommen auf jeden Fall...More

review_data.title: CUCINA COREANA
review_data.content: Ambiente giovanile adatto a tutte le età, personale simpatico e sempre sorridente, la cucina è molto buona e delicata bisogna...More
